title: Some people from Bihar lit up an entire forest in Uttarakhand for showoff
selftext:
I have no words. I don't know what the apt punishment should be for them. 

Link to X post: https://x.com/gharkekalesh/status/1786285977847410813
comments: Can't confirm if this was a deliberate incident. You have a proper source other than twitter?
Straight to jail and psychiatric rehab before they are released into the society.
